Title: Relates to establishing provisions for appeals by a non-party to an intermediate appellate court
Summary: Establishes provisions for appeals by a non-party to a criminal action or proceeding to an intermediate appellate court and permits such non-party to apply for an order staying such action or proceeding.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to establishing provisions for appeals by a non-party to an intermediate appellate court
